name: Words of Illusion
description:
Originally submitted for Brackey's Jam 7.

You've heard of word puzzles. You've heard of platforming puzzles. But what about a game that uses both to craft a unique gaming experience? Enter Words of Illusion, a game about a little robot set to take part in the mysterious "Project Illusion".  Equipped with reality-bending technology, the player can make the robot work towards the goal by typing out the names of objects in the level. These objects then disappear from existence, changing the layout of the level with just a few strokes of the keyboard.  Give Words of Illusion a go, and see if your words truly have power, or if they are merely illusions.

Controls

A-D or Left-Right Arrows - Move and Push

W or Space or Up Arrow - Jump

I - Inspect

Tab - Open/Close Computer

Enter - Submit Text/Select
